text:
After an audio recording revealed that he was purportedly involved in fixing an Assembly by-election in Chhattisgarh, senior Congress leader Ajit Jogi on Sunday said he had sought permission of the party high command to file a defamation suit against the State Congress chief Bhupesh Baghel.

“In a letter to AICC president (Sonia Gandhi), I have sought her permission to file a defamation suit under both civil and criminal laws against Baghel,” Mr. Jogi said here.

Mr. Baghel declared the audio tape to be authentic without any scrutiny, Mr. Jogi said, asking how he came to the conclusion. — PTI
title: Ajit Jogi seeks Sonia’s nod to sue Baghel
